text: Hey, I have a question related to menus. I am creating a custom menu structure module. I want to add my default menu in the module. How to find menu id in HubSpot setting?

Itâ€™s located in the URL as the last chunk of numbers

<http://app.HubSpot.com/menus/|app.HubSpot.com/menus/><accountID>/edit/<menu_id>
